ProjectTitle: Nanoparticle synthesis in an ultrasonic flow microreactor for drug delivery applications
InitialFeedbackHistory: 16/12/2024 Documentation/Metadata: metadata is often generated by instruments during analysis, with your SEM for example you mention "device settings are also automatically displayed in the saved pictures". [REDACTED] more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata [REDACTED] please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy [REDACTED] do you know which repository you will use already? EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) or RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) could be candidates. [REDACTED] will usually ask you to select a license, CC-BY is often used which means others can reuse your data but have to acknowledge you, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/licenses. [REDACTED] repositories will also add a [REDACTED] [REDACTED] upon deposit that you can mention in your publications.
label: good with suggestions
